hanzi-su-wiki:
很

Значения

Очень; весьма

Мнемоника

"Орех был очень твёрд 艮, что даже не поддался под левой ногой 彳."

hěn
(adverb of degree); quite; very; awfully
(наречие степени); довольно; очень; ужасно
rtega_mnemonic:
很很RSvery, quite, much
  • one covers quite a distance when walking 彳 good 艮
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 艮 indicates the sound; 彳 (step) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
很大 [ hěn dà ]: tremendous
很多 [ hěn duō ]: very many; very much; great (quantity)
很快 [ hěn kuài ]: quickly
很少 [ hěn shǎo ]: very little; seldom
寄予很大期望 [ jì yú hěn dà qī wàng ]: to place great hope or expectation on (sth)

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: As the silver supply in the world is now running out the queue for buying it is very long.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "彳" to " Gen " sound. The original meaning is to disobey and disobey. "Said Wen": "Very, I don't listen." Such as "Mandarin. "Wu Yu": "Today the king will fight against the sky very much." Wei Zhao's note: "It's very, against it." "Zhuangzi. "Father of Fishers": "I have never seen it more, but I have heard more and more admonitions. It is said to be very good."

" It " that vicious, after make more " ruthless ." "Guang Yun. Very rhymed": "Very, very hostile. Vulgar and ruthless." Such as "Shang Shu. "Jiuguo": "Jue's heart is very sick, so I can't fear death." "Zuo Zhuan. "Twenty-sixth Year of Xianggong": "The eldest son is beautiful and very beautiful, and he is awe-inspiring to the left."

" Very " means fighting and litigation. Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Chang Di": "Brothers fought against the wall and impose their duties outside." "Mao Zhuan": "Fang, very also." Kong Yingdashu: "The very one, the name of the dispute." Another example is "Book of Rites. "Qu Li Shang": "There is no need to win, no more points." Zheng Xuan's note: "Very, frustrating. It is also called litigation." It means that struggle does not require victory over others, and the distribution of property does not require more than others.

" Very " can also be used as an adverb of degree, which means very, very, and later uprising. For example, "Journey to the West" Chapter 96: "Grandma, only one can see it, but those three can't see it. They describe it as ugly." Chapter 9 of "A Dream of Red Mansions": "Reading is a very good thing, otherwise you will lose your life. Now, what will happen in the end?"
humanum_short_description_en: From "彳" to " Gen " sound. The original meaning is to disobey and disobey.
humanum_full_description:
從「彳」，「艮」聲。本義是違逆、不聽從。《說文》：「很，不聽从也。」如《國語．吳語》：「今王將很天而伐齊。」韋昭注：「很，違也。」《莊子．漁父》：「見過不更，聞諫愈甚，謂之很。」

　　「很」表示凶狠，後多作「狠」。《廣韻．很韻》：「很，很戾也。俗作狠。」如《尚書．酒誥》：「厥心疾很，不克畏死。」《左傳．襄公二十六年》：「大子痤美而很，合左師畏而惡之。」杜預注：「貌美而心很戾。」

　　「很」表示爭鬥、爭訟。如《詩．小雅．常棣》：「兄弟鬩于牆，外禦其務。」《毛傳》：「鬩，很也。」孔穎達疏：「很者，忿爭之名。」又如 《禮記．曲禮上》：「很毋求勝，分毋求多。」鄭玄注：「很，鬩也。謂爭訟也。」意謂鬥爭不要求勝過他人，分配財物不要求多於他人。

　　「很」也可以作程度副詞，表示甚、非常，乃後起義。如《西遊記》第96回：「奶奶，只一位看得，那三位看不得，形容醜得很哩。」《紅樓夢》第9回：「念書是很好的事，不然就潦倒一輩子了，終久怎麼樣呢？」
humanum_short_description: 從「彳」，「艮」聲。本義是違逆、不聽從。

Seal characters (1)

很字的基本解释

很
hěn
甚，非常，表示程度加深：很快。很好。
古同“狠”，凶恶。
古代指争讼：“很无求胜”。

很字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hěn］
［《廣韻》胡墾切，上很，匣。］
(1)违逆；不听从。
(2)谓倔强执拗而不肯前行。
(3)狠毒；残忍。后多作“狠”。
(4)引申为狂暴。
(5)争讼；争斗。
(6)副词。甚；非常。

很字的英文翻译

◎ 很
very, quite, awfully

很字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彳字部】　很； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页366第13
【唐韻】胡懇切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】下墾切，?痕上聲。【說文】不聽從也。一曰行難也。【吳語】今王將很天而伐齊。【註】很，違也。　又【玉篇】諍訟也。【禮·曲禮】很毋求勝。【註】很，鬩也。謂爭訟也。又【廣韻】俗作狠。【孟子】好勇?狠。

很字的源字形

很字的起名意思

非常，表示程度高深。

very
Basic explanation of words
very
hěn
Very, very, means deepening of the degree: soon. well.
Gu Tong is "ruthless" and fierce.
In ancient times, it refers to disputes: "There is no need to win."
very
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [hěn]
["Guangyun" Hu Kenqi, the top is very, the box. ]
(1) Violation; disobedience.
(2) Said to be stubborn and reluctant to move forward.
(3) Vicious; cruel. More "ruthless" later.
(4) The extension is violent.
(5) Contending; fighting.
(6) Adverbs. Very much.
very

◎ very
very, quite, awfully
very

[Yin Ji 2] [彳字部] 　 Very; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 366 13
[Tang Yun] Hu Kenqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Under the cultivation and cutting, the mark is on the sound. [Speaking] I don’t listen. One said it's hard to do it. [Wuyu] Today, the king will fight in heaven. [Note] Very, contrary to.　[Jade articles] Also litigation. [Li·Qu Li] There is no need to win. [Note] Very, 阋也. It is also called litigation. Also 【Guangyun】vulgar and ruthless. [Mencius] So courageous? Ruthless.
